rules_text:
Lifelink
When this creature transforms into Edain, Reverent Healer, you draw a card for each other creature you control.
[i]Reverence[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you cast no spells this turn, untap each creature you control.
[i]Edain's Mend[/i] – {3}{G}{W}: Regenerate target creature you control. If that creature is a Noble, you gain 3 life.
